name: Frostholme
description:
Welcome to Frostholme!

An icy valley far to the north. Population: nobody. Until you showed up!

Determined to prove that this barren wasteland can be lived in, you have tasked yourself with building the beginnings of a small town. Will you manage to secure your place as ruler of Frostholme, or will you succumb to it's chill?

A game for Weekly Game Jam #152 - Shelter

Controls

Use the WASD keys to move your character around.
Use SHIFT to sprint.
Use E to pick up items from the ground, or to attack rabbits.
Use Z , X and C to navigate the building menu, and Q to build your selection. Use T to fall asleep and R to wake up again.

Gameplay

The objective of the game is to build 5 houses. A house is an area enclosed by walls that has floor on the inside, and a bed. It is also at least 2x2 tiles large. A house may only have one bed.
Whilst playing the game, you need to keep an eye on both your temperature and your energy, which are both represented by the bars in the top right of the screen.

Energy

To gain energy, you need to sleep. The higher your temperature whilst sleeping, the faster you gain energy. If your energy falls too low, you will collapse and sleep until you are slightly more energised.
Energy is used up whenever you move.

Temperature

Your temperature will constantly decrease whenever you are outside. To gain temperature, you will need to build and stay close to fires.
You do not lose any temperature when indoors, but also do not gain temperature from nearby fires. The only way to gain temperature indoors is to sleep in a bed.
If your temperature drops to 0, you will die.

Like what you see?
